title: Motor Control and Learning
text:
This course examines the behavioural and psychological principles of motor control and motor learning for understanding motor skill acquisition.
Instructor: Mike Carter (cartem11@mcmaster.ca)
Teaching assistants: Mikayla Lalli, Jiaqiao (Jack) Tang, Nour Al Afif, and Michael Croteau
